snippet.title: ✅  Bone-chilling moment Johnny Depp begs Amber Heard to cut him as he holds a knife
snippet.description:
💖 Please Visit: https://www.facebook.com/Scathc/
💖 Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQju4Bo1Tjk9SzhHQDknWaw?sub_confirmation=1
✍   begged his ex-wife Amber Heard to cut him with a knife in a spine-tingling recording played to court.  It's the final day of Depp giving testimony in the witness box.  Hollywood's Depp is in court to sue News Group Newspapers (NGN) for libel over an April 201 article referring to him as a "wife-beater" which he denies.  The hair-raising exchange between Depp and Heard in July 2016, a month before their divorce settlement, was replayed in court via a recording.  Wielding a knife in his hands, Depp pleaded his ex-wife Amber to cut him in the recording heard in court.   He could be heard saying: "My f****** knife. Cut me... Cut me wherever you want."  In retaliation, Amber begged her ex-husband not to cut himself.  She responded: "Don’t cut your skin. Please do not cut your skin. Please don’t."    She added: "I know. I know it hurts. I feel the same way... You're hurt."  At one point in the recording, the formerly married couple were interrupted by a housekeeper.  Sasha Wass QC, for The ...
💖 #JohnnyDepp, #AmberHeard
